extDescription.message: Live status updates for your followed streams on Twitch and Mixer

optionsAuthorizationsTitle.description: Title for Options page Authorizations section

optionsAuthorizationsDescription.message: Connect one or more accounts to import your followed streams. Your followed streams will display when they are live and are updated automatically when you follow a new stream.
optionsAuthorizationsDescription.description: Description for Options page Authorizations section

optionsAuthorizationConnect.description: Button label for provider authorization action

optionsAuthorizationDisconnect.description: Button label for provider deauthorization action

popupGettingStartedWelcome.description: Welcome message title for new users

popupGettingStartedSettings.description: Welcome message button text for open settings action

popupGettingStartedDescription.message: To get started, connect one or more accounts to import your followed streams.
popupGettingStartedDescription.description: Welcome message description text for next steps

popupNoStreamsLiveDescription.message: Can't get enough? Consider following more streams to see more content here.

popupStreamLinkAccessibleLabel.description: Label used to describe stream status to assistive technologies

providerTokenError.description: Label used to indicate an error with a provider authorization

providerTokenErrorFix.description: Button label for provider authorization error fix action
